parameters.description: The context that describes the current test class
The current test class status.

children.remarks: This method must never throw. Behavior is undefined if it does. Instead, exceptions that occur should be recorded in the aggregator in ctxt and will be reflected in a way that's appropriate based on when this method is called.
children.summary: Sets the current for the current test class and the given test class status.

summary: A base class that provides default behavior when running tests in a test class. It groups the tests by test method, and then runs the individual test methods.

content.value: public abstract class TestClassRunner<TContext, TTestClass, TTestMethod, TTestCase> where TContext : TestClassRunnerContext<TTestClass, TTestCase> where TTestClass : class, ITestClass where TTestMethod : class, ITestMethod where TTestCase : class, ITestCase

Public MustInherit Class TestClassRunner(Of TContext As TestClassRunnerContext(Of TTestClass, TTestCase), TTestClass As {Class, ITestClass}, TTestMethod As {Class, ITestMethod}, TTestCase As {Class, ITestCase})
